input: Despite being a Republican State, India is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations whose head is the British Monarch. This is because

options.A: this mernbership does not affect the sovereign nature of the Indian Republic
options.B: this membership only shows that the British ruled over India
options.C: members of the association are sovereign and independent
options.D: it is a symbol of the unity among the members of the association

explanation: The Commonwealth of Nations is an intergovernmental organisation of 53 member states that were mostly territories of the former British Empire. The membership only shows that the British ruled over India.
